data.name: Robozarro Demo
data.detailed_description:
2D Physics Mayhem!


Run, jump, swing, slide, grab, and blast your way through the slime-filled sewers beneath Mech Angeles.

Hoodwinked on their way to Grandma's 90th birthday party, robot duo 0-Ramatron and B0-3 have just crash-landed in the slime-filled sewers beneath Mech Angeles. In order to survive this most awesome predicament, the two must recover vintage weaponry from The Great Robo War of 20XX and use it to trash turrets, robo-spiders, haywire scrap compactors, angry maintenance bots, and the sewer's biggest secret... Chunks!

Demo Features


  • Blast your way through 10+ levels using a multitude of weapons, gadgets, and ammo!

  • Collect Junk and sell it to Fix + Chip's mobile shop for Health, Grenades, and ammo upgrades!

  • Get the Robo-Arm upgrade to swing across the ceiling while wreaking havoc on enemies below!

  • Use the "Grab N Blast" anti-gravity gun to pick up objects and send them flying across the level to solve puzzles, destroy enemies, grab loot, and more!

  • Go head to head with the Sewer's BIGGEST baddie... Chunks!

data.short_description: Run, jump, swing, slide, grab, and blast your way through the slime-filled sewers beneath Mech Angeles. Hoodwinked on their way to Grandma's 90th birthday party, robot duo 0-Ramatron and B0-3 have just crash-landed in the slime-filled sewers beneath Mech Angeles.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: NVIDIA/AMD Dual Core and above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB NVIDIA/AMD and above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
